comments.author: iannbugzilla@gmail.com
comments.creator: iannbugzilla@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 528009
Make toolbar overlays in utilityOverlay patch v1.0

Where we have customizable toolbars and a menubar there is a certain amount of duplication which can be moved into utilityOverlay which will get even more use as more toolbars are customized.
comments.raw_text: Where we have customizable toolbars and a menubar there is a certain amount of duplication which can be moved into utilityOverlay which will get even more use as more toolbars are customized.

> -  <toolbar type="menubar"
> -           id="addrbook-toolbar-menubar2"
> -    <toolbar id="compose-toolbar-menubar2"
> -  <toolbar type="menubar"
> -           id="mail-toolbar-menubar2"
> -    <toolbar id="mail-toolbar-menubar2">
We changed our IDs to match Thunderbird on the grounds of extension compatibility :P
